name: SwitchBot (SonicMam)
description:
You play as Quandale Dinglelington, exploring a hidden temple, which, to your surprise, is filled with twists, turns, traps and an AI that will stop at nothing to destroy you...However, these AI can assist you in one way... By letting it open crawlspaces, you can dodge and dash through levels. There is a secret at the end of the game... and a way to have fun with the AI with a certain key... one that maybe be in the name...

WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Starting the game :)

This is my first game I ever "finished", so I hope you get enjoyment out of it, even if it's 2 minutes of it. Mind you, I did intend this to be a bit hard despite being a game jam game. Please give feedback in the comments, I'd appreciate it :)

Hope yall have a great day and WOWIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
